definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: city in northern Syria (As. Arpadda Dl:Pa 275)—´[[א]] Is 10:9 elsewh. [[אַרְפָָּד]]; c. 15 miles N. of Aleppo, mod. Tel Erfâd; in OT only as conquered by Assyria, alw. named with Hamath, etc. 2Ki 18:34, 2Ki 19:13 = Is 36:19, Is 37:13 (on LXX (Rafe/q = )Arfa/q cf. Lag:BN 78), also Is 10:9, Je 49:23; (cf. Nö:ZMG 1871, 258 Kiep:ib. 655.)
